title: WiFi connectivity issues in library
description: The WiFi connection in the main library is very slow and frequently disconnects, making it difficult to access online resources for research and assignments.

title: Lab equipment malfunction in ECE Lab
description: The oscilloscope in Electronics Lab 2 is not working properly. The display shows incorrect readings which affects our practical work and experiments.
reply: We have contacted the technical team to inspect the equipment. The oscilloscope will be repaired by tomorrow morning.

title: Exam schedule conflict
description: My Data Structures and Computer Networks exams are scheduled at the same time on March 15th. Please help resolve this scheduling conflict.
reply: The exam schedule has been updated. Your Computer Networks exam has been moved to March 16th at 2 PM. Please check the updated schedule on the portal.

title: Hostel room AC not working
description: The air conditioning unit in my hostel room (Block A, Room 205) has not been working for the past 3 days. It's very uncomfortable during the hot weather.

title: Library book unavailability
description: The reference books for Digital Signal Processing are not available in the library. We need these books for our semester project and upcoming exams.
reply: I have forwarded your request to the library committee. New copies of the DSP reference books will be ordered and should arrive within a week.

title: Bus service timing issues
description: The college bus from Puducherry main bus stand is frequently late by 15-20 minutes, causing students to miss their first period classes.

title: Canteen food quality concern
description: The food quality in the main canteen has deteriorated recently. Many students have complained about the taste and hygiene standards.
reply: We are conducting a thorough inspection of the canteen facilities and will implement necessary improvements. A meeting with the canteen contractor is scheduled.

title: Semester fee payment portal error
description: The online fee payment portal is showing an error when trying to pay semester fees. The transaction fails at the final step.
reply: The payment portal issue has been resolved. The technical team has fixed the gateway problem. You can now proceed with your fee payment.

title: Classroom projector not functioning
description: The projector in Mechanical Engineering classroom ME-101 is not working. This is affecting our theory classes and presentations.

title: Scholarship application status inquiry
description: I submitted my merit scholarship application 3 weeks ago but haven't received any update on the status. Please provide information about the application process.
reply: Your scholarship application is under review by the scholarship committee. You will receive an update within the next 5 working days.

title: Power supply issues in EEE lab
description: There are frequent power fluctuations in the Electrical Engineering lab which is damaging sensitive equipment and interrupting practical sessions.

title: Sports facility maintenance required
description: The basketball court surface is damaged and needs repair. The court lines are also faded and need repainting for proper gameplay.
reply: The sports committee has approved the maintenance work. The basketball court renovation will begin next week during the semester break.

title: Internet connectivity in IT lab
description: The internet connection in the IT lab is very slow, making it difficult to complete programming assignments that require online resources and cloud services.
reply: The network infrastructure has been upgraded with a new high-speed connection. The IT lab now has dedicated bandwidth for better performance.

title: Attendance marking system error
description: The biometric attendance system is not working properly and is not recording attendance for some students, affecting our attendance percentage.

title: Workshop equipment safety concern
description: Some of the machinery in the mechanical workshop lacks proper safety guards and warning signs, which poses a risk to students during practical sessions.
reply: Safety inspection is being conducted by our technical team. All necessary safety measures and equipment will be installed before the next practical session.

title: Placement cell information request
description: I need information about upcoming placement drives and the registration process. The placement cell website doesn't have updated information.
reply: The placement schedule has been updated on the portal. Registration for upcoming drives is now open. Please check your student email for detailed information.

title: Parking space shortage
description: There is insufficient parking space for student vehicles, especially two-wheelers. Many students have to park outside the campus which is unsafe.

title: Exam hall seating arrangement issue
description: The seating arrangement in the main exam hall is too cramped, making it difficult for students to write comfortably during long duration exams.
reply: We are reviewing the seating arrangement and will implement a more comfortable layout for the upcoming semester exams. Additional exam halls will also be utilized.

title: Hostel mess timing inconvenience
description: The hostel mess closes too early in the evening, making it difficult for students who have late classes or lab sessions to have dinner.
reply: The mess timing has been extended by one hour. Dinner will now be served until 9:30 PM to accommodate students with late schedules.

title: Laboratory safety equipment missing
description: The electrical engineering lab is missing essential safety equipment like fire extinguishers and first aid kits, which is a serious safety concern.
